snippet: Gov. Jay Nixon signed legislation on Friday repealing a contentious law that barred Missouri teachers from using Web sites that allow “exclusive access” with students or former pupils who are 18 or younger.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jay Nixon signed legislation on Friday repealing a contentious law that barred Missouri teachers from using Web sites that allow “exclusive access” with students or former pupils who are 18 or younger.

headline.main: Missouri: Teacher-Student Web Chats Are Legal Again
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Teacher-Student Web Chats Are Legal Again
